name: Heimdall 2: Into the Hall of Worlds
name_original: Heimdall 2: Into the Hall of Worlds
description:
Heimdall 2: Into the Hall of Worlds is an adventure-arcade game developed by Core Design. It came out on 01-01-1994. It was published by Core Design.
You can play Heimdall 2: Into the Hall of Worlds on PC.
